text:
Question 146) A train driver earns $ 100.00 per trip and can only travel every 4 days. He only wins if he makes the trip and knows he will be on vacation from June 1st to 10th, when he will not be able to travel. His first trip took place on January 1st. Consider that the year has 365 days.
If the driver wants to earn as many trips as much as possible?
A) 37
B) 51
C) 88
D) 89
E) 91
